description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You pilot a flying saucer on a mission to defend the Earth from the invading Martian forces. Your ship is the latest in space technology, outfitted with advanced evasive maneuver capabilities as well as upgradable weapons and armor.  Watch out for the Martians with their space ships and thier grim space creatures! If you like old school space shooters, then you need to play Mars Revenge!
